SELECT c.id AS channelId, c.channel_name AS channelName, COUNT(*) AS totalFilteredCount, SUM(CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(yc.created_at, '%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-%m') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS thisMonthFilteredCount, SUM(CASE WHEN DATE(yc.created_at) = CURDATE() THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS todayFilteredCount, SUM(CASE WHEN YEAR(yc.created_at) = YEAR(CURDATE()) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS thisYearFilteredCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM youtube_comments yc2 INNER JOIN youtube_videos v2 ON yc2.video_id = v2.id INNER JOIN youtube_channels c2 ON v2.channel_id = c2.id WHERE c2.user_id = #{userId} AND c2.id = #{channelId} AND yc2.deletion_status = 'ACTIVE') AS totalCommentCount, CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM youtube_comments yc3 INNER JOIN youtube_videos v3 ON yc3.video_id = v3.id INNER JOIN youtube_channels c3 ON v3.channel_id = c3.id WHERE c3.user_id = #{userId} AND c3.id = #{channelId} AND yc3.deletion_status = 'ACTIVE') > 0 THEN ROUND((COUNT(*) * 100.0 / (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM youtube_comments yc4 INNER JOIN youtube_videos v4 ON yc4.video_id = v4.id INNER JOIN youtube_channels c4 ON v4.channel_id = c4.id WHERE c4.user_id = #{userId} AND c4.id = #{channelId} AND yc4.deletion_status = 'ACTIVE')), 2) ELSE 0.0 END AS filteringPercentage FROM youtube_comments yc INNER JOIN youtube_videos v ON yc.video_id = v.id INNER JOIN youtube_channels c ON v.channel_id = c.id WHERE c.user_id = #{userId} AND c.id = #{channelId} AND yc.deletion_status = 'ACTIVE' GROUP BY c.id, c.channel_name
SELECT NULL AS harmfulnessLevel, 0 AS count WHERE 1 = 0
SELECT 'UNKNOWN' AS category, 0 AS count WHERE 1 = 0

SELECT v.id AS videoId, v.title AS videoTitle, COUNT(*) AS totalFilteredCount, SUM(CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(yc.created_at, '%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-%m') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS thisMonthFilteredCount, SUM(CASE WHEN DATE(yc.created_at) = CURDATE() THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS todayFilteredCount, SUM(CASE WHEN YEAR(yc.created_at) = YEAR(CURDATE()) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS thisYearFilteredCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM youtube_comments yc2 WHERE yc2.video_id = #{videoId} AND yc2.deletion_status = 'ACTIVE') AS totalCommentCount, CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM youtube_comments yc3 WHERE yc3.video_id = #{videoId} AND yc3.deletion_status = 'ACTIVE') > 0 THEN ROUND((COUNT(*) * 100.0 / (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM youtube_comments yc4 WHERE yc4.video_id = #{videoId} AND yc4.deletion_status = 'ACTIVE')), 2) ELSE 0.0 END AS filteringPercentage FROM youtube_comments yc INNER JOIN youtube_videos v ON yc.video_id = v.id INNER JOIN youtube_channels c ON v.channel_id = c.id WHERE c.user_id = #{userId} AND v.id = #{videoId} AND yc.deletion_status = 'ACTIVE' GROUP BY v.id, v.title
SELECT NULL AS harmfulnessLevel, 0 AS count WHERE 1 = 0
SELECT 'UNKNOWN' AS category, 0 AS count WHERE 1 = 0
